name: Jerry 2: Herd of Cats!?
description:
Help Jerry herd his cats to the goal! The faster you move, the more likely the cats are to follow you. Throw out a fish to get the cats to come running!

Controls:

  • WASD to move jerry
  • Q and E to rotate the camera
  • Left CTRL to throw a fish
  • R to restart
  • ESC to exit

Out of Control design:

  • The Player is not fully in control of the cats. Cats do as cats please, but they are attracted to your movement (and the smell of fish!). Use this to your advantage to herd to cats to the goal.

Third Party Resources:

  • Unity 3D
  • Blender
  • Krita
  • Kenney's Game Assests
  • gamesounds.xyz
  • beepbox.co
  • 128 Mhz
